author: @wsfa12news
title: Troy University to slash dual enrollment course costs in 2025
text:
Troy University to slash dual enrollment course costs in 2025
TROY, Ala. (
[WSFA](http://www.wsfa.com/)) - Getting a higher education will come at a lower cost in the new year, Troy University announced Thursday. Starting in January, the university says it will [lower the price tag on its dual enrollment classes](https://www.troy.edu/academics/academic-programs/accelerate-dual-enrollment-high-school-students.html) for high school students by more than $100 per credit hour.
The reduced cost will apply to any student who qualifies for in-state tuition, as well as those who live in certain counties in Florida and Georgia.
The classes currently cost $145 per credit hour, but, just like the ball in Times Square, come Jan. 1, it will plummet. Students will find the new price tag sitting at just $33 per credit hour.
“Troy University is enhancing access to higher education for high school students by offering affordable college-level courses,” said Sohail Agboatwala, Senior Vice Chancellor of Student Services and Administration. “This initiative gives students a valuable head start on their academic journey, allowing them to save time and money as they work toward their degrees. By prioritizing accessibility and quality, TROY reaffirms its dedication to empowering learners and building stronger connections with our communities.”
Available courses include any 1,000- or 2,000-level course, as long as the prerequisite requirements are met, and range from Composition and Modern English to Finite Math, Introduction to Business, Introduction to Psychology and more. The schedule of classes can be found
[here](https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2flink.mediaoutreach.meltwater.com%2fls%2fclick%3fupn%3du001.wrbvefvadEw-2FtDyBvd5QFrFyk0mHXQItx5z7zPgyZtSuyXyAOFx-2FZqsXJFmwd7eg4ABcoxObhfPU1Y3E14ri5bpEVbWqSu3NqhXxtehj-2B0Gr6lnUPliGmLXea0jA-2BDiEiC1J_-2FIkndPAwtL6DOpROyN9Uc0AK3hZHbSKppXubQXkzDJWuLWJ6926n26GmQMGGV72pmuk56iBtCxGhQ0Mo0CdimE3aK7961VeJMLzigksFl0e8H6ZVQTGLb2m1lQsAcEB-2FJu5wPxqenjCee-2BS9t9VbwHsPkK-2BQH1zgHGkZN6GDzYSdijN09-2FpyQoQGqvJbsha0a90uBoGtV35kXLO1Lx79IEvbAJd-2Fzb9CaFCygzFYfxCsJkhMqp-2BVMQVBqWSa-2FF1Cuo3CYbkPBSNfcD8P7s3keXSDrfFNfuCuejrQf6T-2Fmaoc9cSt2GM6d419gYK5Tg9o-2BLh2guEVLoaMk59ZoUb9FxipqhOX0fmVDEouhSu8DhHKYdhMdDTTmLEP4p-2BInbw-2F&c=E,1,5I3aZ-rpejUg_MNpGydADccV0j6QUJ5EUzpFlp_k8zCu0Ym_ws2AfHplRv79dMN4Qm1B9Xopx2G2MajtUKrwr0aU3NhUPOcXH4yHPU_YvxpOsiuMfYFEmA,,&typo=1), and those interested in applying can [visit Troy’s website](https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2flink.mediaoutreach.meltwater.com%2fls%2fclick%3fupn%3du001.wrbvefvadEw-2FtDyBvd5QFrFyk0mHXQItx5z7zPgyZtSuyXyAOFx-2FZqsXJFmwd7egrBDNeHQA-2Bm1-2Fz3rTkgPVDNyiSO-2BofBOXufV4ZbPJYgzODQ69-2Fs-2BTkLW2IdBrA4zFsoLyTAsO3ZaH9cbDtEiIcscno7IrOq4rf3fkMFPcPaR1Dl7zBr0Y5NjjVtxN470-2FLrSe_-2FIkndPAwtL6DOpROyN9Uc0AK3hZHbSKppXubQXkzDJWuLWJ6926n26GmQMGGV72pmuk56iBtCxGhQ0Mo0CdimE3aK7961VeJMLzigksFl0e8H6ZVQTGLb2m1lQsAcEB-2FJu5wPxqenjCee-2BS9t9VbwHsPkK-2BQH1zgHGkZN6GDzYSdijN09-2FpyQoQGqvJbsha0a90uBoGtV35kXLO1Lx79IMhxrEFMv9UovEpnavz36RsUXlkRQozuagXynZZD27-2F-2FkRQyehJ8KlnlideNHyGiSBsMrlEIGOP0chpPzPO9Wbw0X68GfeXyEljpnVL4pKuHIbBJnKcvEZvyQVMxNw3cS-2B2CgcJBQ3kw-2BCby84Ydc9DtOyYo03vlxS2HedfwgBYw&c=E,1,LpiTSw2Z5NdJXCOVu3cG_FNHUUxA7WmWRymayPWqM5T23oE0Agx1bwgXFfoPo10QhGA_XqtF-hCB-wnF4rISV9L0GJRi4Y-oIiu8WuHVLR09GzedC6-XwW2UThJc&typo=1).

author: News desk
title: Over 62,000 Pakistani pilgrims arrive in Saudi Arabia - Pakistan Observer
text: The Pakistan Hajj Mission (PHM) has welcomed 62,148 pilgrims in Madinah and Makkah under both government and private schemes since the start of the month-long pre-Hajj flight operation on May 9, the Ministry of Religious Affairs reported on Saturday. “So far, 46,648 pilgrims have arrived via 185 flights under the government scheme, while 15,500 have arrived under the private scheme,” said Muhammad Umer Butt, a spokesman for the Ministry of Religious Affairs. An additional 22,090 Pakistani pilgrims are expected to arrive in Makkah over the next nine days, he added. This year, the PHM will host over 70,105 pilgrims under the government scheme and more than 80,000 under the private scheme. Currently, over 13,000 pilgrims have arrived in Saudi Arabia under private schemes. With the cooperation of Saudi authorities, around 33,500 Pakistani pilgrims have visited Riaz Al-Jannah in Madinah. The PHM is utilizing mobile apps, two toll-free helplines, and four WhatsApp numbers to address pilgrims’ complaints. Additionally, the spokesman said two central hospitals and a dozen dispensaries in the Haram are providing medical facilities to pilgrims, with 322 doctors and medical staff on duty. A total of 511 Hajj Moavineen, including Pakistani civilians and uniformed personnel, are working to provide pilgrims with travel, accommodation, and food facilities. The Ministry of Religious Affairs has 152 officers and supporting staff working in various departments, including the control room, Madinah and Jeddah airports.—APP

author: PULS 24
title: Klinik muss nach Offenlegung von Shakiras Krankenakte zahlen
text:
Klinik muss nach Offenlegung von Shakiras Krankenakte zahlen
Die Popsängerin aus Kolumbien war während ihrer Tournee im Februar in Lima wegen starker Bauchschmerzen in das Krankenhaus eingeliefert worden. Sie musste ein Konzert absagen. Das zweite geplante Konzert in Lima konnte Shakira aber absolvieren. Während des Klinikaufenthaltes war die Krankenakte der 48-Jährigen in Onlinenetzwerken veröffentlicht worden. Die Klinik erklärte damals, sie untersuche einen "schwerwiegenden ethischen Verstoß gegen unseren Verhaltenskodex und die Vorschriften zum Umgang mit personenbezogenen Daten".
Die mehrfache Grammy-Gewinnerin Shakira ist derzeit auf ihrer ersten großen Tournee seit sieben Jahren, die sie nach Lateinamerika, nach Kanada und in die USA führt.
Zusammenfassung
- Eine Klinik in Lima, Peru, muss nach der Veröffentlichung von Shakiras Krankenakte eine Geldstrafe von 190.000 Dollar (rund 161.000 Euro) zahlen.
- Die kolumbianische Sängerin war im Februar wegen starker Bauchschmerzen in das Krankenhaus eingeliefert worden und musste daraufhin ein Konzert absagen, konnte aber ein zweites Konzert in Lima spielen.
- Die Klinik Delgado Auna bestätigte einen schweren ethischen Verstoß und die Gesundheitsbehörden verhängten die Strafe, während Shakira aktuell auf ihrer ersten großen Tournee seit sieben Jahren ist.

author: kwm107
title: Novel Biological Mechanism Discovered That Could Lead to New Treatments for Neurological Disorders, Cancers
text:
Novel Biological Mechanism Discovered That Could Lead to New Treatments for Neurological Disorders, Cancers
The lab of
Yongchao C. Ma, PhD, at Stanley Manne Children’s Research Institute at Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children’s Hospital of Chicago discovered a fundamental biological mechanism that could lead to new treatments for neurological diseases, such as spinal muscular atrophy (SMA) and autism, as well as different cancers. The study was published in the journal Human Molecular Genetics.
Dr. Ma’s team found that chemical modification of RNA (called RNA methylation) regulates mitochondrial function. Mitochondria is best known for generating energy in the cell. However, Dr. Ma explains, mitochondria does much more. It also acts as a signaling center that regulates broad biological processes within the cell.
[Dr. Ma’s lab previously linked mitochondrial dysfunction to the development of SMA](/en/news-stories/new-target-found-for-treatment-of-spinal-muscular-atrophy/) and autism, while other labs have implicated it in cancer pathogenesis.
“Our finding establishes a critical link between RNA methylation, mitochondria and diseases that relate to mitochondrial dysfunction, which means that now we have potential for new treatments for many different disorders,” said Dr. Ma, who is the senior author on the study. He holds the Children’s Research Fund Endowed Professorship in Neurobiology at Lurie Children’s and is Associate Professor of Pediatrics, Neurology, and Neuroscience at Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine.
Dr. Ma’s lab found that RNA methylation regulates mitochondrial function by controlling production of key enzymes that are components of mitochondria. They demonstrated in a neural stem cell model and a mouse model that loss of RNA methylation significantly changed mitochondrial function in stem cells and neurons.
“We are very excited about this discovery and the promise of innovative treatments, which could involve developing modifiers of RNA methylation to rectify the mitochondrial defect,” said Dr. Ma. “We are also honored to contribute significantly to the study of RNA methylation. There is exponential growth in this field, and we hope that our ongoing research on RNA methylation in the nervous system will bring new insights on brain development and neurological disorders.”
Research at Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children’s Hospital of Chicago is conducted through Stanley Manne Children’s Research Institute, which is focused on improving child health, transforming pediatric medicine and ensuring healthier futures through the relentless pursuit of knowledge. Lurie Children’s is a nonprofit organization committed to providing access to exceptional care for every child. It is ranked as one of the nation’s top children’s hospitals by U.S. News & World Report. Lurie Children’s is the pediatric training ground for Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine.

organizations.name: stanley manne children’s research institute at ann & robert h. lurie children’s hospital of chicago

author: Amy Woodyatt
title: Comité Olímpico de Australia condena la "intimidatoria" petición en línea que cuestiona acreditación de la competidora Raygun para breaking en París 2024
text:
“Sabía que la gente no entendería mi estilo” dice la atleta olímpica Raygu 0:49 (CNN) -- El Comité Olímpico de Australia (COA) condenó una petición anónima en internet relativa a Rachael Gunn —la B-Girl conocida como Raygun y cuya actuación se volvió viral— afirmando que contiene falsedades sobre cómo fue seleccionada para competir en los Juegos de París.
Gunn, una profesora universitaria de Sydney de 36 años, no consiguió ningún punto en sus batallas contra la estadounidense Logistx, la francesa Syssy y la lituana Nicka, y perdió 18-0 en cada una de ellas. Mientras tanto, su actuación suscitó comentarios y críticas generalizadas en las redes sociales.
La actuación de Rachael Gunn en los Juegos Olímpicos de París ha sido objeto de críticas. (Foto: Ezra Shaw/Getty Images).
En un comunicado emitido este jueves, el director ejecutivo del COA, Matt Carroll, criticó la petición "vejatoria, engañosa e intimidatoria" que "contiene numerosas falsedades diseñadas para engendrar odio contra una atleta que fue seleccionada en el equipo Olímpico Australiano a través de un proceso de clasificación y nominación transparente e independiente".
La petición, publicada el domingo y dirigida al primer ministro de Australia, Anthony Albanese, y al COA, se publicó en Change.org. En ella se alega -sin pruebas- que Gunn "manipuló" el proceso de selección, "planteando serias dudas sobre la imparcialidad e integridad del proceso".
También alega que el esposo de Gunn podría haber formado parte del panel de selección y pide a Gunn y a la jefa de misión olímpica de Australia, Anna Meares, que se disculpen por "engañar al público australiano e intentar gasear a la opinión pública y socavar los esfuerzos de auténticos atletas".
Gunn dijo en un video de Instagram que no se dio cuenta de que su actuación "abriría la puerta a tanto odio, que francamente ha sido bastante devastador".
publicidad Y añadió: "Agradezco mucho la positividad y me alegro de haber podido aportar algo de alegría a vuestras vidas, eso es lo que esperaba".
Carroll dijo que COA escribió a Change.org exigiendo que se retire inmediatamente la petición.
"El COA está particularmente ofendido por la afrenta a nuestra jefa de Misión, Anna Meares", dijo Carroll. "La jefa de Misión del equipo australiano no desempeñó ningún papel en las pruebas de clasificación ni en la nominación de atletas para el Comité de Selección del COA, del que la jefa y yo somos miembros".
"Es vergonzoso que estas falsedades inventadas por una persona anónima puedan publicarse de esta manera. Equivale a intimidación y acoso, y es difamatorio", añade su declaración.
"La petición ha incitado al odio público sin ninguna base factual. Es atroz. Ningún atleta que haya representado a su país en los Juegos Olímpicos debería ser tratado de esta manera y estamos apoyando al Dr. Gunn y a Anna Meares en estos momentos".
CNN se puso en contacto con Change.org para obtener más comentarios.
Gunn añadió en su declaración en video de Instagram: "Realmente me gustaría pedirle a la prensa que por favor deje de acosar a mi familia, a mis amigos, a la comunidad australiana de breaking y a la comunidad más amplia de street dance".
"Todos han pasado por mucho a raíz de esto, así que les pido por favor que respeten su privacidad".
